thread.section_title: InsuranceHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InsuranceHub | insurancehub.com
thread.title: David Spain, Comfort Homes of Georgia
thread.title_full: InsuranceHub reviewed by David Spain, Comfort Homes of Georgia

author: David Spain, Comfort Homes of Georgia
title: David Spain, Comfort Homes of Georgia
text: We have been working with Gary Miller and InsuranceHub for several years and could not be more satisfied with both the level of service and the policies that we hold. We have multiple companies with multiple types of policies; in addition to the many transactional requests that go along with being a new home builder. Gary and InsuranceHub's response times, quality of products sourced, and customer service are top notch. All of this has led me to move every business and personal insurance policy we have to InsuranceHub. As we all know, a business is only as good as their people -- Gary Miller and the InsuranceHub Team are the best one could ask for. Thank you for taking care of us and our businesses!
